title: Jane Seton: or, the Kings Advocate. A Scottish historical romance

snippet: " I must have been mad, and Vipont was worse thanmad to permit me! Let me sleep if I can," thoughthe, " fresh energies wdl come with slumber; and I, whohave escaped from English Norham, and from the castleof Stirling, too, where once old Barncleugh had me fastin the Douglas chamber, will surely find a passage fromthis house—or the devil's in it!—and adieu my7 plans ofvengeance for a time."
